Trade/Device Name(s): Psychemedics Microplate EIA for Methamphetamine in Hair
Regulation Name(s): Enzyme Immunoassay, Methamphetamine and Methamphetamine Metabolites
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Psychemedics Microplate EIA for Methamphetamine in Hair, an enzyme immunoassay for preliminary detection of methamphetamine use in human hair.
Indications for Use Summary: Preliminary qualitative detection of methamphetamine in human head and body hair samples using a 5 ng/10 mg hair cutoff, intended for in-house professional use only and requires confirmation of positive results by LC/MS/MS.
